ARABIC: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلْخَٰسِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There is no doubt that in the akhira they will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will surely be losers in the life to come,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No doubt they shall be losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the Day of Judgment they will certainly be lost.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So it occurred that they are the losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: No doubt, in the Hereafter they will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: No doubt that in the hereafter they will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: without a doubt, in the world to come they will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Assuredly in the Hereafter they are the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and in the life to come, they will surely be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Undoubtedly they in the Hereafter shall be the very losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Undoubtedly, they are the ones who will be the losers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Without doubt, in the Hereafter they will perish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: No doubt, in the Hereafter, they will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In the Everlasting Life, they shall assuredly be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: There is no doubt that in the Hereafter they will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Assuredly, it is they, in the Hereafter, who will be the losers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:109] Without a doubt — verily — in the Hereafter they are the ones who will be the losers, because their journey’s end shall be the Fire, in which they shall be perpetually.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Assuredly) truly, O Muhammad (in the Hereafter they are the losers). This verse was revealed about those disbelievers who mocked Muhammad and the Qur'an.
